Desc.entry: A registered charity that promotes nature reserves as wildlife havens at Woodhouse Washlands, Hammonds Field at Redmires and 20 Wellsick Wood. Other activities include promotion of the reserves, education, fundraising, practical conservation and provides help and advice for churchyards. To become a member of Yorkshire Wildlife Trust and visit all their nature reserves please see website at www.ywt.org.uk.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-5pm. Please telephone to make an appointment
